main event: A bright object similar to a mirror was observed traveling at a high altitude in a westerly direction, described by witnesses as resembling a shooting star.
interesting points: Witnesses observed the object changing size while traveling,The object moved steadily before slowing down and altering its trajectory,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 to 30 minutes,The object was reported to be brilliant blue-white in color,The observation was made from a backyard.
sighted object: remarkable bright object moving like a shooting star
